div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

title.value: ICHOM Patient Centered Outcomes Measure Set for Breast Cancer

publisher.value: HL7 International - Clinical Interoperability Council Group

name.value: HL7 International - Clinical Interoperability Council Group

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

description.value: Codes used in a Patient Reported Outcomes Instrument to express the degree of agreement
Valueset used in a Patient Reported Outcomes Instrument to express the degree of agreement

name.value: Annual follow-up of clinical questionnaire response

description.value: Clinical response questionnaire at annual post-treatment follow-up
Represents if the breast cancer patient received surgery to the axilla during the last year.
Valueset of surgery types of the axilla
Represents if the breast cancer patient received axillary clearance during the last year. Axilla clearance could be due to lymph node involvement after sentinel lymph node biopsy.
Example of a breast cancer patient who received axilla clearance
Example of a breast cancer patient who underwent surgery to the axilla
Represents if breast cancer patient received best supportive care during the last year.
Example of a breast cancer patient who received best supportive care
Represents the height of a person diagnosed with breast cancer
Represents the weight of a person diagnosed with breastcancer
Example of the height of a patient diagnosed with breast cancer
Example of the weight of a patient diagnosed with breast cancer
A patient who has been diagnosed with or is receiving medical treatment for breast cancer. This profile includes the ICHOM patient characteristics and demographic factors.
Represents if the breast cancer patient received surgery during the last year.
Codes indicating the types of breast surgery a patient underwent
Example of the surgical procedure the breast cancer patient underwent
A staging system to describe the amount and spread of breast cancer in a patient's body, using TNM staging (per AJCC 8th Ed.). This profile is in alignment with the mCODE TNM Stage Group Profile.
Represents if the patient received chemotherapy during the last year.
Example of a breast cancer patient who received chemotherapy

name.value: Clinical response at 6 months post-treatment follow-up

description.value: Clinical response questionnaire at 6 months post-treatment follow-up
Clinical response questionnaire at baseline (first doctors' visit)
Extended example: example showing clinical TNM staging (M)
Extended example: example showing clinical TNM staging (N)
Example showing TNM staging in patient with breast cancer
Extended example: example showing clinical TNM staging (T)
Represents the type and impact of a complication experienced by a patient
Example of a complication in patient with breast cancer
Represents if breast cancer was the cause of death
Example of death attributable to breast cancer
Represents the level of education of a patient.
Valueset of the education level of a patient
Represents the endopredict score on a scale of 1.1 to 6.2
Example of the endopredict score
Example of the estrogen receptor status in a patient with breast cancer
Represents if the estrogen receptor status is positive in a patient with breast cancer
Valueset of the Estrogen receptor status
Represents the ethnicity of a patient. This extension is aligned with USCore

description.value: The characteristics and demographic factors of an example patient.

description.value: The characteristics and demographic factors of an example patient.

description.value: The characteristics and demographic factors of an example patient.
Example of the menopausal status of a patient
Example of the targeted therapy for this patient.
Example of how the real treatment plan was followed
Example of why the treatment plan was not followed
Represents if the patient carries a germline mutation predisposing breast cancer
Valueset of the genetic mutation predisposing breast cancer
Example of whether a patient carries a germline mutation predisposing breast cancer
Valueset of the grade of the tumor
Represents if the human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2) receptor status is positive in a patient with breast cancer
Valueset of the HER2 receptor status
Example of the human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2) status in a patient with breast cancer
Represents the histological type of the tumor

name.value: Histological type of the tumor ValueSet

description.value: Valueset of the histological types of tumors
Example of the histological type of the breast cancer tumor
Represents if the patient received hormonal therapy during the last year.
Example of a breast cancer patient who received hormonal therapy
Represents if the breast cancer patient received immunotherapy during the last year.
Example of a breast cancer patient who received immunotherapy
Codes indicating the impact of a complication experienced by the breast cancer patient
ValueSet of the impact of a complication experienced by the breast cancer patient
Valueset of intent of therapy
Represents the tumor grade of DCIS component of the breast cancer tumor
Example of the tumor grade of DCIS component of the breast cancer tumor
Valueset of the laterality of breast cancer
Valueset of the laterality of new breast cancer
Codes indicating the location of the implant that was placed during reconstruction surgery
Valueset of the location of the implant during reconstruction surgery
Represents the number of lymph nodes involved
Example of the number of involved lymph nodes in a patient with breast cancer
Example of the number of resected lymph nodes in a patient with breast cancer
Represents the mammaprintscore on a scale of 0.000 to 1.000
Example of the mammaprint score
Represents the menopausal status of a patient
Valueset of the menopausal status of a patient
Valueset indicating if a molecular profiling tool was used
Codes used to describe the different types of molecular profiling scoring

name.value: Observation identifiers for treatment plan non-compliance reason CodeSystem

description.value: Codes covering observation identifiers for treatment plan non-compliance reaso

name.value: Observation identifiers for treatment plan non-compliance reason ValueSet

description.value: Valueset of reason for why the treatment plan was not followed
Represents the oncotype score on a scale of 0 to 100

name.value: Patient reported response at post-treatment follow-up

description.value: Patient-reported response at every 6 months for first 2 years post-treatment, after 2 years tracked annually for up to 10 years
Codes covering if the patient received sufficient information about the treatment options
Valueset covering if the patient received sufficient information about the treatment options
Codes covering for why the treatment plan was not followed
Valueset of reason for why the treatment plan was not followed
Represent the properties of the primary breast cancer diagnosis
Example of the primary breast cancer diagnosis of a patient

name.value: Questionário de Coleta no Início do Tratamento

description.value: Questionário de coleta de informações do paciente no início do Tratamento de Câncer de Mama
Represents the race of a patient. This extension is aligned with USCore.
Represents if the breast cancer patient received radiotherapy during the last year.
Example of a breast cancer patient who received radiotherapy

name.value: Re-operation due to involved margins ValueSet

description.value: Kind of re-operation due to involved margins
Represents whether the patient has had a re-operation since their surgery for breast cancer and whether it was due to involved margins.
Indicate if the patient followed the multidisciplinary recommended treatment plan
Codes covering if the patient followed the multidisciplinary recommended treatment plan
Valueset of if the patient followed the multidisciplinary recommended treatment plan

name.value: Real Treatment Plan Not Followed CodeSystem

description.value: Codes covering if the patient has not followed the multidisciplinary recommended treatment plan
Valueset of the reasons of a re-operation
Valueset of the kind of treatment that the multidisciplinary team recommended
Represents if the breast cancer patient received reconstruction surgery during the last year.
Example of a breast cancer patient who underwent reconstruction surgery
The method of confirming recurrence breast cancer
Additional code covering combination of radiological and histological diagnosis method
Valueset of the methods used to confirm recurrence of breast cancer
Additional code covering whether there is evidence of local, regional or distant recurrence of neoplasm
Valueset about whether there is evidence of local, regional or distant recurrence of neoplasm
Example of method of confirming recurrence breast cancer
Valueset of the relationship status of a patient
Example of a reoperation due to involved margins after primary surgery
Represents the number of lymph nodes resected
Patient's documented history of comorbidities
Codes used in a Patient Reported Outcomes Instrument to express the statisfation response
Valueset used in a Patient Reported Outcomes Instrument to express the statisfation response
Represent the properties of the secondary breast cancer diagnosis
Example of the secondary condition breast cancer diagnosed in a patient
Represents the size of the invasive tumor

name.value: Staging Type for Stage Group ValueSet

description.value: Valueset indicating the type of staging, clinical or pathological, of breast cancer.
Valueset of targeted surgery types of the axilla
Type and duration of targeted therapy
Valueset of the location of radiotherapy
Represents the extent of a tumor metastasis in remote anatomical locations (per AJCC 8th Ed.). This profile is in alignment with mCODE TNM Distant Metastases Category Profile.
Valueset of the TNM stage for the M category, according to TNM staging rules
Represents the stage of the primary tumor (per AJCC 8th Ed.). This profile is in alignment with mCODE TNM Primary Tumor Category Profile.
Valueset of the TNM stage for the T category, according to TNM staging rules
Represents the presence or absence of metastases in regional lymph nodes (per AJCC 8th Ed.). This profile is in alignment with mCODE TNM Regional Nodes Category Profile.
Valueset of the TNM stage for the N category, according to TNM staging rules
Indicate why the multidisciplinary recommended treatment plan was not followed
Valueset of reason for the treatment plan not being followed

description.value: Represents the treatment that a multidisciplinary team recommended during a multidisciplinary meeting

Valueset of the types of re-operation
